sense.def:
To produce something
pomeni, da nekaj izdelamo, ustvarimo ali povzročimo.

seg.quote: This drug has produced terrible effects on children.
Parents are responsible for the offspring they produce.

sense.def:
To produce evidence or an argument
pomeni pokazati dokaz ali navesti dejstva, ki utemeljujejo naše stališče.

seg.quote: He produces no evidence for his belief.

sense.def:
To produce an object from somewhere
pomeni nekaj prinesti na plan, tako da lahko drugi vidijo.

seg.quote: Poirot produced the letter from his pocket.

sense.def:
To produce a play, film, programme, or record
pomeni organizirati izvedbo igre oziroma snemanje filma, oddaje ali plošče in odločati, kako naj izvedba oziroma snemanje poteka.

seg.quote: The film was directed, written and produced by Mel Brooks.

sense.def:
Produce
je hrana in drugo, kar človek pridela v velikih količinah in nato proda.

seg.quote: They go to market to buy supplies and sell their produce.
